sentences.english: Lastly discuss Points for attention of using no-clean flux.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还谈到了免洗助焊剂使用注意事项。

sentences.english: For example of solder ball, flux residues, clamping marks.
sentences.chinese: 如锡珠，助焊剂痕迹，夹抓纹之清理。

sentences.english: The surface of liquid flux should be at least one inch higher than the position of the foaming stone.
sentences.chinese: 助焊剂液面至少应保持在发泡石上方约一英寸。

sentences.english: Stay samples with clean after cooling isopropyl alcohol cleaning residue flux.
sentences.chinese: 待样品冷却后用干净的异丙醇清洗残留助焊剂。

sentences.english: Will the sample needs of solder part in flux in 5 to 10 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 将样品需要焊锡的部分浸入助焊剂中5到10秒。

sentences.english: Materials meeting lead-free requirements are used for lead-containing soldering flux made in our company.
sentences.chinese: 本公司生产的有铅助焊剂已采用符合无铅要求的材料。

sentences.english: The use of fluxes with different activities affects the solderability and wetting balance of Pd coating.
sentences.chinese: 不同活性助焊剂的使用也会影响钯镀层的焊锡性能。

sentences.english: Solder Balling is recognized by numerous tiny solder balls trapped along the peripheral edge of the flux residue after reflow.
sentences.chinese: 产品回焊后在残留的助焊剂周边会有大量小的锡球。

definition: solder mask (applied to a circuit board)
